parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates a headgear item and tries to link it to headgear slot. If slot is occupied with another item, the item in the slot will be replaced.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''addHeadgear''' item

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> item: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[addHeadgear]] "H_HelmetB";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[headgear]], [[removeHeadgear]]
</value></part></template></root>
